vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.10.28;
son of: Joktan (H3355);
brother of: Almodad (H0486), Sheleph (H8026), Hazarmaveth (H2700), Jerah (H3392), Hadoram (H1913A), Uzal (H0187), Diklah (H1853), Abimael (H0039), Sheba (H7614H), Ophir (H0211), Havilah (H2341I) and Jobab (H3103)
Another spelling of o.val (עוֹבָל "Obal" H5745)
§ Ebal = "stone" or "bare mountain"
Arabian people, descended from Joktan
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Sobal; descendiente de Seír; (b) עוֹבָל   hijo de Joctán; descendiente de Sem; (c)   montaña
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以巴錄 这个字在原文的意思是 "石頭" 或 "禿山"
陽性專有名詞
1) 朔巴的一個兒子 (創 36:23;代上 1:22,40)
專有名詞 地名 (以巴路山)
2) 咒詛之山, 在示劍以北, 和基利心山相對
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以巴录 这个字在原文的意思是 "石头" 或 "秃山"
阳性专有名词
1) 朔巴的一个儿子 (创 36:23;代上 1:22,40)
专有名词 地名 (以巴路山)
2) 咒诅之山, 在示剑以北, 和基利心山相对

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.23;
son of: Shobal (H7732);
brother of: Alvan (H5935), Manahath (H4506B), Shepho (H8195) and Onam (H0208)
§ Ebal = "stone" or "bare mountain"
a son of Shobal

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Ebal = "stone" or "bare mountain"
n pr loc
mountain of cursing, north of Shechem and opposite Mount Gerizim
